sentences.sentence: The nose to the left, seven. By misleading Parliament, which is a serious political misdemeanor, Johnson, who was ousted as Prime Minister by his own party less than a year ago, will not receive a pass to visit the parliamentary estate and would have been banned for 90 days from sitting as an MP had he not resigned earlier this month. He quit after being sent the report's findings in advance. The debate and subsequent vote which pitched the former prime minister against former cabinet ministers have laid bare the split within the Conservatives over Boris Johnson's legacy. It has also angered the country, which views the reports of partying by politicians and their support team during Covid lockdowns as proof that there was one rule for the people and one for those in power. Although some see the vote as symbolic, others say the endorsement of the damning report by such an overwhelming margin is a small but important step in restoring people's trust in Parliament.

This overheating doubles the global average and fuels exceptional heat waves and droughts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: As can be seen in this graph, warming has soared since the 1990s, breaking temperature records on several occasions.

As we speak, such parties are participating or leading governments in Italy, Sweden and Finland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: While in Spain, the Conservatives' People Party struck a series of coalition deals at regional and local level with the radical right Vox party ahead of next month's general election on the other hand far-right parties have been in power for years now in both Hungary and Poland forming an alliance in what critics describe as against European democracy and rule of law they say that the reasons behind this trend vary from country to country from immigration to the economy and even the war in Ukraine. Voters are quite disillusioned with the ordinary conventional political parties. And as we've seen, there have been numerous globalised crises. First, you had the financial crisis, the pandemic, economic fallout of the war in Ukraine and cost of living crisis. And in times of crisis, some of these populist far-right parties, they do find quite simple solutions to these very complicated problems, promising to protect the people and also sovereignty against the perceived and real threats from the outside.
